headline: Berkshire Hathaway Selling Part of Verisign Stake; Stock Falling After-Hours
summary: The price of the offering hasn’t been set yet but it could raise $1.2 billion based on Verisign’s stock price in after-hours trading.

headline: Buffett's Berkshire sells one-third of VeriSign stake for $1.23 billion
summary: Warren Buffett's conglomerate has invested in nternet infrastructure and domain name registry company Verisgn since 2012.

raw.headline: Buffett's Berkshire sells one-third of VeriSign stake for $1.23 billion
raw.summary: Warren Buffett's conglomerate has invested in nternet infrastructure and domain name registry company Verisgn since 2012.

headline: Verisign Announces Secondary Offering of Common Stock by Selling Stockholders
summary: RESTON, Va., July 28, 2025--VeriSign, Inc. (NASDAQ: VRSN) (the "Company"), a global provider of critical internet infrastructure and domain name registry services, today announced the launch of an underwritten secondary offering (the "Offering") by affiliates of Berkshire Hathaway Inc. ("Berkshire Hathaway"), of 4,300,000 shares of the Company’s common stock, par value $0.001 per share ("Common Stock").
